title: Ad Astra
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey and Abdul-Hakim Shabazz (Indy Politics) discuss the film Ad Aster and other sci-fi films with dad issues. They also discuss their upcoming production of Henry IV, Part One at Indy Bard Fest.
